title: MD
biography: Marc Van Ranst is a Belgian public health physician and Professor of Virology at the Katholieke Universiteit Leuven and the Rega Institute for Medical Research. On 1 May 2007, he was appointed as Interministerial comissionar by the Federal Government of Belgium to prepare Belgium for an influenza pandemic.
aiSummary: Marc Van Ranst is a virology specialist with an H-index of 83 at KU Leuven (Member). Has been published in New England Journal of Medicine, The Lancet Global Health, Nature Communications. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
